movieDescription: Karthikeya(Ravi Teja) is a man who keeps his family first before everything. As time passes by, he falls in love with Pushpa(Raashi Khanna) and when things seem to be going fine, he suddenly comes across a dreaded criminal called Irfan with whom he shares a dreaded past.

movieInfo:
Directed by: James Wan
Written by: Leigh Whannell, James Wan
Starring by: Ryan Kwanten, Amber Valletta, Donnie Wahlberg
Genres: Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Every town has its own ghost story, and a local folktale around Ravens Fair is about a ventriloquist named Mary Shaw. After she went mad in the 1940s, she was accused of kidnapping a young boy who yelled out in one of her performances that she was a fraud. Because of this she was hunted down by townspeople who in the ultimate act of revenge, cut out her tongue and then killed her. They buried her along with her â€œchildren,â€� a handmade collection of vaudeville dolls, and assumed they had silenced her forever. However, Ravens Fair has been plagued by mysterious deaths around them after Mary Shaws collection has returned from their graves and have come to seek revenge on people that killed her and their families. Far from the pall of their cursed hometown, newlyweds Jamie and Lisa Ashen thought they had established a fresh start, until Jamieâ€™s wife is grotesquely killed in their apartment. Jamie returns to Ravens Fair for the funeral, intent on unraveling the mystery of Lisaâ€™s death. Onceâ€¦

movieInfo:
Directed by: K.S. Ravikumar
Starring by: Sudeep, Nithya Menon, Ravishankar P
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Satyam(Sundeep), a real estate agent is a soft and kind-hearted person. On the other hand, his look-alike brother Shivam(Sudeep) loots black money from big shots. After a point in time, it becomes tough for the police to find out who among the brothers is the actual culprit.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Prasad Ramar
Starring by: Siddharth Narayan, Deepa Sanniddi, Tanusree Chakraborty
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A man suffering from Insomnia gets introduced to pills that allow him to cultivate and experience lucid dreams that could continue with interruptions too. With each real-life character that has caused an impact in him getting a parallel in his dream, the distinction between reality & dream thins out and that consumes him. The final act on how he gets out of it brings the curtains down with a wonderful little perspective brought to note.

movieInfo:
Created by: Nandini Bv Reddy
Starring by: Adith Arun, Tejaswi Madivada, Navdeep
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Swathi comes from a middle class family from Vijayawada. Since she is the only child, she was raised like a princess by her father and he wants the best guy for her. Her mother on the other hand is worried that all the good guys are getting married and there wont be any left by the time she wants to marry. Due to the pressure of her mother, Swathi manipulates her parents into sending her to Hyderabad and she starts working in an ad agency. There, she falls for not one, but two guys and how she deals with this dilemma is the rest of the story.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Jean-Marc VallÃ©e

Genres: Comedy, Drama
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Davis (Jake Gyllenhaal), a successful private equity fund partner, struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. Despite pressure from his father-in-law, Phil (Chris Cooper), to pull it together, Davis continues to unravel. What starts as a complaint letter to a vending machine company turns into a series of letters revealing startling personal admissions. Davisâ€™ letters catch the attention of customer service rep, Karen (Naomi Watts), and, amidst emotional and financial burdens of her own, the two form an unlikely connection. With the help of Karen and her son Chris (Judah Lewis), Davis starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew.

movieInfo:

Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Detective Kaniyan Poongundran is on the lookout for a challenging case. His prayers are answered before long, as a kid approaches him to solve his petâ€™s bizarre death. The dog, a pomeranian, is killed by a 9mm bullet. Poongundran senses that things arenâ€™t as simple as they seem and sets out to investigate with his trusted sidekick Mano in tow.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Christian Ditter

movieDescription: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since they were 5, so they couldnâ€™t possibly be right for one anotherâ€¦ or could they? When it comes to love, life and making the right choices, these two are their own worst enemies. One awkward turn at 18, one missed opportunityâ€¦ and life sends them hurling in different directions. But somehow, across time, space and different continents, the tie that binds them cannot be undone. Will they find their way back to one another, or will it be too late? Based on Cecelia Ahernâ€™s bestselling novel â€œWhere Rainbows Endâ€�, LOVE, ROSIE is a modern comedy-of-errors tale posing the ultimate question: Do we really only get one shot at true love?

movieInfo:

Directed by: K.S. Ravikumar

movieDescription: Kotikokkadu is about Satya who runs a real-estate agency. His only goal is to fulfill his fatherâ€™s dream of living a billionaireâ€™s life. As a shortcut to achieve this goal, he starts robbing the illegal money held by the tax evaders. In order to put everyone in the dark, Satya claims that all those crimes are done by his look-alike thug Shiva. Not with standing that the two businessmen and a corrupt cop have started making moves to nail Satya. Does the police catch Satya with ample and substantial evidence or does he manage to walk scot-free?

movieDescription: The movie revolves around Shrirang Deshmukh, who is a teacher by profession. He decides to go to his village and settle in his ancestral home. Things take a turn when a powerful builder tries to convince him to sell him the house.

movieDescription: A young politician finds himself in a position where he has to contest against his girlfriend, who is ambitious. Circumstances force his look-alike twin to also get involved in this political battle.

One fine day, he comes across a girl named Saroja(Keerthi Suresh) during the journey and falls flat for her. Twist in the tale arises when the train they are travelling in suddenly becomes unstoppable due to certain weird circumstancesâ€¦

movieDescription: The series follows the relationship between the two cousins as they journey across the Kingdom of Mahishmati, uncovering hidden mysteries, stopping ancient terrors and defending their people from danger.

movieDescription: Right from his childhood days, Ram(Nagarjuna) takes upon a journey to make contact with the eternal powers of the god. He joins the ashram of Padmananda Swamy(Sai Kumar) in Tirumala and gets enlightened about Lord Venkateswara and his spiritual powers. To seek more divinity, he reaches the main temple in Tirumala and starts praying for the lord.

movieDescription: Settled in London, Aman hopes to marry Asha, an Indian woman also based in London. He visits her parentsâ€™ house to seek their permission to marry her. However, his plans to impress the family start failing when they discover that he is a Pakistani.
